code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteProduct from'./DeleteProduct';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductListItem(_ref){let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex justify-between items-center p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"font-semibold",children:[product.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-blue-600",children:["$",product.price]})]}),product.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1",children:product.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit-product/".concat(product._id),className:"btn btn-secondary btn-sm",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteProduct,{productId:product._id,onDeleted:()=>window.location.reload()})]})]});}export default ProductListItem;
